hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn Buraidah from his father, that:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) would not go out on the Day of Fitr until he had eaten, and he would not eat on the Day of Nahr (the day of sacrifice) until he came back

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الأَكْلِ يَوْمَ الْفِطْرِ قَبْلَ أَنْ يَخْرُجَ
chapter.eng-name: Eating before going out on the day of Fitr
